amendment.description: An amendment No. 55 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce funds made available in the Overseas Contingency Operations budget by $3,546,000,000 to better correspond with the Presidents request. Protects all amounts made available for the National Guard and Reserve Component Equipment modernization shortfalls for homeland defense and emergency response.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 206 (Roll no. 403).
